website_summaries.verdict: Colorful design, easy-fill opening, and decent price make this piñata a solid, budget-friendly choice.
pros: Features an adorable Macaw design with bright colors that captures kids' attention
Perfect for parties for youngsters that love birds
Is easy to stuff with treats, and comes at a reasonable price
cons: Some reports of the piñata breaking at the attachment mechanism
Material may be tough for some small kids to break open
Candy gets stuck in the wing tips

customer_reviews.title: Bright cheery colors and just the right amount of durable!
customer_reviews.text: Lasted long enough for all the kids (5-6 yrs) to get a chance to hit it a few times with the dowel rod piñata stick we used! And not to long that they got frustrated!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Very well put together. I filled it with candy until it couldn't hold anymore. Hung it from a rafter and it was actually hard to break. Several small kids hit it and it didnt break. It's a great Piñiata. I was afraid it would be thin, but it's not.
customer_reviews.author: Cagoforth

customer_reviews.title: Great value and product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome good quality pinata. All of my local stores sell these for twice the price and they are super cheapo and crappy. This one was great. Easy to fill, and challenging to break which is what you want. Nice sturdy hanging cord as wel.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Legel

customer_reviews.title: Great Piñata!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son’s class party for Cinco de Mayo but didn’t want to spend a lot of money. This is very high quality. Would buy again and recommend!
customer_reviews.author: TMB

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, Unique Piñata
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves parrots & I was so happy to find this piñata online! High quality, nice size! I didn’t take a picture prior to using it, but here is one after :)
customer_reviews.author: MN Momma

customer_reviews.title: Great piñata!
customer_reviews.text: The best piñata I’ve bought so far. I am a Spanish teacher and throw a piñata party once a year. This is the first one that completely held up without bursting open on the first hit or break off from the hook. Every kid got several turns. It’s also a great size, bigger than what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and hugh great price! !!😘
customer_reviews.text: I stuffed it with cotton due to fact my Grand daughter doesn't want to hit a bird.We are bird family.So hers is stuffed for decor just hanging in her room😄😁💞👍💖
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great entertainment for the kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter's Baptism. 18 toddlers got multiple tries with it and needed a little assistance from an adult to get it going. Perfect size for 18 kids and looked just as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Took a while to break (which was the whole point)
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my almost adult son and filled it with Easter eggs. It took a bit of bashing to break, and was great fun!
customer_reviews.author: Adanne

customer_reviews.title: So cute.
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest Bird you have ever seen. Only gave it 4stars because it’s really hard to fill it with candy. Cavity inside seems a little small. So we just had a bowl of candy sitting on the side to throw.
customer_reviews.author: gooddkitty

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: One swing from a three year old and the piece where the rope attaches completely detached and whole thing fell down. All the work to fill it and hang it and it didn’t even last through one swing from a little 3 yr old girl
customer_reviews.author: Lmae

customer_reviews.title: Fun piñata
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our party!!! Kids each got like 2 turns up hit it before it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Damaged In Transit
customer_reviews.text: The product itself was fine but unfortunately, the box the company used was not sturdy enough and the product was damaged en route. Not enough time to order another one. We had to duck tape it because the candy kept falling out of the hole.
customer_reviews.author: Omynameistaken

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: This was great! What I loved about it... Is that it was a traditionally made in yada. Just enough wax needed for fun but opened properly so the candy spread.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too cute and held lots of candy.
customer_reviews.text: A very sturdy pinata. We used this for a fiesta and it did take a manly many to finally break it open but it was fabulous as part of our decor.
customer_reviews.author: iopdoc

customer_reviews.title: Very cute pinata
customer_reviews.text: Cute and a big hit with the kids. Pinata is a little to durable. Was tough for the little ones to break open.
customer_reviews.author: guidedog Mom

customer_reviews.title: Colorful
customer_reviews.text: Bright & cheerful colors. It was easy to pack with candy for the children. They loved it!
customer_reviews.author: jonbon

customer_reviews.title: Mccaw
customer_reviews.text: The piñata was very colorful and my twins loved it. They are boy, girl so it would be ok for either for a party. The only problem with the piñata is that they used corrugated cardboard as the backing. It was so hard to break my 6 foot 7, 275 lb. colleges age son, had to break it for us with a baseball bat. It took him several swings. There is no way a group of 4-5 yr old kids could break this. So I guess depending on your focus group it would be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: So durable!
customer_reviews.text: We searched for weeks for a good pinata and I was very happy to come across this one. The size was great and it was so durable! In fact the only reason it broke open was because the feet got knocked off first, the entire bird stayed 100% undamaged, until my 8 year old attacked it after it fell on the ground lol! Only issue we had was the opening for the candy is between the wings and it's rather small so we had to shove everything in one by one. Next time we get a pinata though, Aztec Imports is who we will go through.
customer_reviews.author: Stormy

customer_reviews.title: Great for any animal lover
customer_reviews.text: I loved this piñata. Great price. Great product. Held a lot of candy.
customer_reviews.author: MrsSmith

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The piñata arrived in an undamaged box. The piñata was not sealed in several places. I had to tape in order to use.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Party pleaser
customer_reviews.text: Great for what we spent. Took about 30 hits from blind folded 5 year olds to break. We used toys instead of candy and it still held a good amt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Fun
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger than I thought! Very cool. Perfect for my niece's birthday
customer_reviews.author: LashAsh

customer_reviews.title: This pinata was great!! Easy to fill and not too hard ...
customer_reviews.text: This pinata was great!! Easy to fill and not too hard to break (Used it at a 3 and 5 yr old birthday party).
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit for the birthday
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fill and really nice looking. I added pull strings to the bottom very easily since my son loved it to much to break it.
customer_reviews.author: Wings Fan

customer_reviews.title: Didn't immediately break on first blow!
customer_reviews.text: Kids had a nice time and got a few turns. Quite sturdy in the right places!
customer_reviews.author: km

customer_reviews.title: Animal Life theme party
customer_reviews.text: lasted the perfect amount of swings for everyone to get two hits, make a couple dents then spew candy everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: This Pinata was not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: 120 people for a birthday party and 60 kids. Lets say this was horrible. Candy got stuck in all the tips, e.g. wing, tail and bottom. It took many hits to get this broken. After a while the adults were helping out. You could not even fit a lot of candy in this as its VERY narrow. I was VERY disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Look at dimensions. I didn't.
customer_reviews.text: Actually. No. It's huge. Didn't realize that. Just have it hanging as decoration rather than toy for my birds.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: So pretty. We named her Polly. She was a tough girl
customer_reviews.author: hazel gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My boss, who’s always wanted a piñata, loved this. It holds a ton of candy as well
customer_reviews.author: SSchott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: kids had SO much fun with this!!! perfect in every possible way!
customer_reviews.author: Luciana Ceccovilli

customer_reviews.title: Fun piñata
customer_reviews.text: This was adorable and fun! It held up long enough to give all the kids a chance to hit it, but the older kids (8,9,10) hit it hard enough for candy to drop.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Wombacher

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product. It lasted quite a few rounds with the children.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Painter

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Colorful and pretty but a bit small for what I thought a piñata should be. It held almost 3 pounds of candy.
customer_reviews.author: Cabecho

customer_reviews.title: Pinata Fun
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this pinata for Easter entertainment for all of the kids in our family. They had fun trying to break it- it was pretty durable and took many swings to break- but better that than it breaking on the first hit. The kids really enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Well protected in packing. Nice Pináta
customer_reviews.text: Very colorful , Would be great for a children’s party
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Sadorus

customer_reviews.title: disappointment
customer_reviews.text: It literally broke on the first hit. Very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: alona

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Stuffed a lot of candy (more than it says) and was perfect for 4 year old party. Used it for a pirate theme.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Gosliga

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and it looks great. My daughter is thrilled to use this at ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and it looks great. My daughter is thrilled to use this at her birthday party.
customer_reviews.author: Stargazer

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it
customer_reviews.text: This has a HUGE hit with the kids at my children's birthday party. Took a bit of a beating to get it to break open but man was it fun to watch the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This thing was cute and fast to get. It was a huge hit at the party and took a lot of weight from all the stuff I crammed in there.
customer_reviews.author: Jaxin

customer_reviews.title: Cute! Bright! Although a bit small?
customer_reviews.text: It's thinner than most- and overall smaller target for the kids to hit- but it was WELL WORTH THE PRICE! CUTE! VERY COLORFUL! Love it. Would make just cute party decorations rather than a pinata too!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Fun stuff
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price we paid. easy to fill though not stable once it is full. Very bright and festive! Would recommend the company and product.
customer_reviews.author: Bell pepper

customer_reviews.title: Wacked!
customer_reviews.text: This was surprisingly durable. All the kids got a couple wacks, then we had to start "cheating"....which is better than one that busts open for the first kid. : ) No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ahrens

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice for small kiddie party. Not a lot of candy fit in it but worked like a charm and everyone had a great time.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it!
customer_reviews.text: This was for my granddaughter's birthday... She had a "Rio" party. The kids loved it.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughters 11th birthday. It broke (the fastener broke off the bird after 1 hit). Typically you get 10 to 20 hits on a pinata. If my 16 year old son took it out with one hit using a baseball bat I wouldn't complain, but this is an 80 lb child using half a broom stick.
customer_reviews.author: David Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This pinata was a lot of fun at my daughter's birthday party, the kids hit it a lot with the bat and it held up good, the only weak point is the feet of the bird, one whack and they fly off, spilling the candy.
customer_reviews.author: timmyg

customer_reviews.title: Parrot Pinata Fun for Cinqo de Mayo
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Fun for a party. Not intended to be durable. Also good for a lesson in culture of Mexico.
customer_reviews.author: GrapeWiz

customer_reviews.title: Great Pinata
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that keeps this from being a five star is that it was slightly smaller than expected. Otherwise it was pretty awesome
customer_reviews.author: Azher Salikuddin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pinata!
customer_reviews.text: It's not huge, but it's a good size for a pinata. It broke easily, but not TOO easily. Everyone got a few whacks in. It did not come off it's hanger, which was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Charity

customer_reviews.title: Kids really enjoyed it, very good value
customer_reviews.text: Almost a bit too sturdy, took quite a bit of beating to get it open but watching that was fun, good size and design
customer_reviews.author: JS

product_meta.title: Aztec Imports Macaw Pinata
product_meta.description:
Color:Original VersionFROM THE MANUFACTURER
Macaw pinata is made of cardboard and strips of brightly colored tissue paper.
feature_bullets: Makes great decoration and fun party game at theme birthday parties
Made of cardboard and tissue paper
Pinata can be filled with up to 2lbs of toys and candy
Includes strong cable tie at the top for hanging pinata

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars117 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
